attributes.description: At AutoCity Group we understand how important buying a vehicle is for our customers. And we go out of our way to ensure we deliver to the standards you would expect. We design a package around your budget. All prices exclude administration, delivery and license registration fees. Prices subject to change without prior notice. Test drives welcome. Finance available through all major banks. Finance is subject to Bank Approval. Optional Warranty and Service plans available. Tradeins will be considered. Ts Cs Apply. EOE.

attributes.description:
The Suzuki Ertiga is a compact MPV with lots of features, making it ideal for daily and family trips in great comfort.
Features of this vehicle include a Multi-Function Steering Wheel, Rear Park Distance Control, Air-Conditioning, Bluetooth Connectivity, Radio, Power Steering, Central Locking and much more!
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock.
A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.
Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
